channel.title: Mary L. Cook – Here and There
channel.description: Scott and Jackie's Travels – Thousand Trails Reviews, Campground Reviews, Fulltime RVing, European Travel

item.title: Mary L. Cook Public Library
item.dc:creator: Jackie Cundiff
item.description: Name: Mary L. Cook Public Library Location: 381 Old Stage Road, Waynesville, OH 45068 Mary L. Cook Library is a friendly, comfortable place to spend some time or find materials to take home and enjoy. We were greeted by staff as we entered and felt very comfortable looking around the building.
item.content:encoded:
Name: Mary L. Cook Public Library

Location: 381 Old Stage Road, Waynesville, OH 45068

Mary L. Cook Library  is a friendly, comfortable place to spend some time or find materials to take home and enjoy. We were greeted by staff as we entered and felt very comfortable looking around the building.
